dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: I am Inferno, the Hell Knight Defender. What brings a feeble creature like you to my domain?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek a challenge. Face me if you dare!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words, little one. Prepare to face the flames of Hell!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You talk big for someone surrounded by flames.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Insolent fool! Taste my wrath!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I won't back down!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You will regret your defiance! Prepare for annihilation!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for my words.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies won't save you now!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense great power within you. Let us join forces.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Join forces? You amuse me. I have no need for weakling allies.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Farewell, insignificant mortal.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My offer still stands. Think wisely.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Enough! Your words irritate me. Face your doom!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I didn't come here to fight. I'll leave you in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Hah! You will leave this realm in ashes!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I won't stay where I'm not welcome.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You cannot escape the inevitable. Prepare to be crushed!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for disturbing you. I'll go now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your apologies mean nothing! Face the consequences of your intrusion!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace. I mean no harm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? In the depths of Hell? How amusing.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek no quarrel with you. Let us part ways peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Part ways? Very well, insignificant being. Leave my sight!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I respect your power. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect alone won't save you from destruction. Begone!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You may not see now, but threats often bring destruction.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Threats from the likes of you amuse me. Begone before I unleash Hell!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let us coexist peacefully. There's no need for hostility.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Coexist? Ha! Your naivety knows no bounds.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see your decision. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice, insignificant one. Your presence annoys me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If peace is not an option, then prepare for battle.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Battle it is! Your choice seals your fate. Face the consequences!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I didn't mean to disturb you. I will leave now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Disturbance or not, you will face the repercussions of your presence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no intention of causing trouble. I'll go now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Intentions matter not. Punishment will be swift and merciless.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for any inconvenience. I'll depart immediately.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies won't save you from what's to come. Prepare for your fate.
